name: GUN DESCEND
description:
GUN DESCEND is a short FPS about falling down a tunnel and shooting stuff. Made for the Ludum Dare 48 jam.

LD48 link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/gun-descend

CONTROLS:

  • WASD to move. Spacebar to dash.
  • Left click shoots the weapon on the left.
  • Right click shoots the weapon on the right.
  • Magenta enemies take damage from both guns.
  • Blue enemies only take damage from the blue gun.
  • Red enemies only take damage from the red gun.
  • You take damage from enemies and yellow orbs.

FEATURING:

  • 9 levels with increasingly difficult groups of enemies.
  • Freefalling shootouts.
  • A shotgun (Sawed off, probably) and an SMG. No need to reload.
